question: Which Indian economist has been conferred 'Honoris Causa' by the University of Engineering & Management (UEM) in Kolkata?
explanation: Dr. Bibek Debroy, an Indian economist, indologist and author, has been conferred \'Honoris Causa\' by the University of Engineering & Management (UEM) in Kolkata, West Bengal. He is currently serving as the Chairman of the Economic Advisory Council to the Prime Minister (EAC-PM).  Mr. Debroy is also the Member of the NITI Aayog, the think tank of Government of India (GoI). \'Honoris Causa is a degree awarded without examination as a mark of esteem.
